long_description: Bursting with pretty flowers, the merino wool SmartWool Blossom Bitty Socks will have you thinking of spring all year round. Non-cushioned design means you'll hardly feel the Blossom Bitty socks in your shoes; tapered, flat-looped toe boxes eliminate bulkiness. Merino wool provides excellent temperature control and moisture management, so you're warm when it's cold and cool when it's warm. SmartWool socks are guaranteed not to itch and can be repeatedly machine washed and dried without shrinking. Elastic arches eliminate bunching, slipping and sagging. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Bursting with pretty flowers, the merino wool SmartWool Blossom Bitty Socks will have you thinking of spring all year round.
